1.title: Sweat Equity
1.plot: Vanilla Ice is putting down his tools to offer house flipping advice to first time flippers.

imdb.plot outline: Vanilla Ice is putting down his tools and putting on a suit to offer house flipping advice and funding to first time flippers. But before the work begins, he must find that diamond in the rough and choose which project is too good to pass up. Three groups pitch their projects to Rob and Krista, who grill and drill the house flipping hopefuls on their properties, budgets, and renovation plans. Who will Rob choose? Will the flippers stay on budget and manage to complete the house? Or will the project crumble like a ton of bricks? One thing is for sure, it's going to be a tough sell!
imdb.title: Vanilla Ice, Flip Advice
plot: Vanilla Ice is putting down his tools to offer house flipping advice to first time flippers.

Vanilla Ice is putting down his tools and putting on a suit to offer house flipping advice and funding to first time flippers. But before the work begins, he must find that diamond in the rough and choose which project is too good to pass up. Three groups pitch their projects to Rob and Krista, who grill and drill the house flipping hopefuls on their properties, budgets, and renovation plans. Who will Rob choose? Will the flippers stay on budget and manage to complete the house? Or will the project crumble like a ton of bricks? One thing is for sure, it's going to be a tough sell!::Departure Films
